alert.note: Alert for San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 11:51AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower with gusty winds and small hail will impact portions of central San Mateo and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 1215 PM PDT... At 1150 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower with gusty winds and small hail 8 miles southwest of Half Moon Bay, or 14 miles southwest of Pacifica, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Mateo, Redwood City, Mountain View, Palo Alto, San Bruno, Pacifica, Menlo Park, Foster City, Los Altos, Burlingame, San Carlos, East Palo Alto, Belmont, Millbrae, Half Moon Bay, Hillsborough, Los Altos Hills, Atherton, Woodside and Highlands-Baywood Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this shower and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains
